newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA - NOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 18.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA - NOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 18.

text.p: Here are the main headlines from Lithuania's M-1 plus radio station's noon news report on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- Lithuanian parliament members who have returned from an inter-parliamentary union conference say that Russia is changing its tactics towards NATO. Russia attempted to get Asian and Arab countries to condemn NATO expansion.
- President Algirdas Brazasukas begins two days of meetings with foreign ambassadors to Lithuania. The major topic of the meetings will be Lithuania's bids to join NATO and the European Union.
